languages.text: "В качестве компенсации за внимание к моей просьбе я, магос Ханейманн, официально обязаюсь сопровождать вас в системе Райкад в качестве телохранителя и оберегать любой ценой вплоть до прекращения своих жизненных функций. Но — лишь в пределах системы Райкад".

traits.locale_text: "В качестве компенсации за внимание к моей просьбе я официально возлагаю на себя обязательство вести обслуживание вашего корабля в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}технопровидца{/g} до наступления момента, когда мои услуги более не потребуются вам".

languages.text: "As compensation for your consideration of my request, I, Magos Haneumann, officially undertake to accompany you in the Rykad System in the role of bodyguard and to protect you at all costs until your life functions cease. But only within the limits of the Rykad System."
languages.original_text: "В качестве компенсации за внимание к моей просьбе я, магос Ханейманн, официально обязаюсь сопровождать вас в системе Райкад в качестве телохранителя и оберегать любой ценой вплоть до прекращения своих жизненных функций. Но — лишь в пределах системы Райкад".

traits.locale_text: "As compensation for your consideration of my request, I, Magos Haneumann, officially undertake to accompany you in the Rykad System in the role of bodyguard and to protect you at all costs until your life functions cease. But only within the limits of the Rykad System."

"As reimbursement for your heeding of my request, I am officially assuming the obligation of maintaining your ship in the capacity of an {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}enginseer{/g} until such time as my services are no longer required."

"As a reimbursement for your heeding of my request, I am officially assuming the role of the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}enginseer{/g} of your ship until such time as my services are no longer required."

"As a reimbursement for your heeding of my request, I am officially assuming the role of the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}enginseer{/g} of your ship until such time as my services are no longer required."

"As compensation for your consideration of my request, I, Magos Haneumann, officially undertake to accompany you in the Rykad System in the role of bodyguard and to protect you at all costs until your life functions cease. But only within the limits of the Rykad System."

"As compensation for your consideration of my request, I, Magos Haneumann, officially undertake to accompany you in the Rykad System in the role of bodyguard and to protect you at all costs until your life functions cease. But only within the limits of the Rykad System."

languages.text: "Als Gegenleistung dafür, dass Ihr meine Bitte erfüllt, verspreche ich, Magos Haneumann, Euch als Leibwächter ins Rykad-System zu begleiten und Euer Leben um jeden Preis zu beschützen, bis Eure Lebensfunktionen eingestellt werden. Allerdings nur innerhalb der Grenzen des Rykad-Systems."
languages.original_text: "As compensation for your consideration of my request, I, Magos Haneumann, officially undertake to accompany you in the Rykad System in the role of bodyguard and to protect you at all costs until your life functions cease. But only within the limits of the Rykad System."

traits.locale_text: "Als Entschädigung dafür, dass Ihr auf mich gehört habt, übernehme ich offiziell die Rolle des {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Maschinensehers{/g} Eures Schiffs, bis meine Dienste nicht länger benötigt werden."

languages.text: « En contrepartie de l'attention que vous portez à ma requête, moi, le magos Haneumann, m'engage officiellement à vous accompagner dans le système de Rykad en tant que garde du corps et à vous protéger envers et contre tout jusqu'à l'arrêt de vos fonctions vitales. Mais seulement dans les limites du système de Rykad. »
languages.original_text: "As compensation for your consideration of my request, I, Magos Haneumann, officially undertake to accompany you in the Rykad System in the role of bodyguard and to protect you at all costs until your life functions cease. But only within the limits of the Rykad System."

traits.locale_text: « En contrepartie de l'attention que vous portez à ma requête, moi, le magos Haneumann, m'engage officiellement à vous accompagner dans le système de Rykad en tant que garde du corps et à vous protéger envers et contre tout jusqu'à l'arrêt de vos fonctions vitales. Mais seulement dans les limites du système de Rykad. »

languages.text: “如果你愿意考虑我的请求，作为补偿，我，哈努曼贤者，将正式承诺以护卫的身份与你在莱卡德星系中同行，不惜一切代价保护你，直到你的生命机能停止。不过，我的陪同仅限于莱卡德星系之内。”
languages.original_text: "As compensation for your consideration of my request, I, Magos Haneumann, officially undertake to accompany you in the Rykad System in the role of bodyguard and to protect you at all costs until your life functions cease. But only within the limits of the Rykad System."

traits.locale_text: “为了报答你对我请求的回应，我愿意正式担任你船上的{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}引擎先知{/g}，直到你不再需要我的服务为止。”

languages.text: 「私、マゴス・ヘニュマンの要求を聞き入れてくれたお礼に、ライカドシステムの範囲内であれば、あなたの生命機能が停止するまでボディガードとしてあなたに同行し、あなたを全力で守ることを約束します」
languages.original_text: "As compensation for your consideration of my request, I, Magos Haneumann, officially undertake to accompany you in the Rykad System in the role of bodyguard and to protect you at all costs until your life functions cease. But only within the limits of the Rykad System."

traits.locale_text: 「私、マゴス・ヘニュマンの要求を聞き入れてくれたお礼に、ライカドシステムの範囲内であれば、あなたの生命機能が停止するまでボディガードとしてあなたに同行し、あなたを全力で守ることを約束します」

languages.text: «Como compensación por su consideración a mi petición, yo, Magos Haneumann, me comprometo oficialmente a acompañarle en el Sistema Rykad en calidad de guardaespaldas y a protegerle a toda costa hasta que cesen sus funciones vitales. Pero solo dentro de los límites del Sistema Rykad».
languages.original_text: "As compensation for your consideration of my request, I, Magos Haneumann, officially undertake to accompany you in the Rykad System in the role of bodyguard and to protect you at all costs until your life functions cease. But only within the limits of the Rykad System."

traits.locale_text: «Como compensación por su consideración a mi petición, yo, Magos Haneumann, me comprometo oficialmente a acompañarle en el Sistema Rykad en calidad de guardaespaldas y a protegerle a toda costa hasta que cesen sus funciones vitales. Pero solo dentro de los límites del Sistema Rykad».

languages.text: "Talebimi dikkate almanızın karşılığı olarak ben, Magos Haneumann, Rykad Sistemi'nde size eşlik etmeyi ve hayati fonksiyonlarınız sona erene dek sizi ne pahasına olursa olsun korumayı resmî olarak taahhüt ediyorum. Yalnız, taahhüdüm Rykad Sistemi ile sınırlıdır."
languages.original_text: "As compensation for your consideration of my request, I, Magos Haneumann, officially undertake to accompany you in the Rykad System in the role of bodyguard and to protect you at all costs until your life functions cease. But only within the limits of the Rykad System."

traits.locale_text: "Talebimi dikkate almanızın karşılığı olarak ben, Magos Haneumann, Rykad Sistemi'nde size eşlik etmeyi ve hayati fonksiyonlarınız sona erene dek sizi ne pahasına olursa olsun korumayı resmî olarak taahhüt ediyorum. Yalnız, taahhüdüm Rykad Sistemi ile sınırlıdır."
